Author: throwawayfordays2021
Text: I have non hormonal birth control for this potential reason.  My doctor said that people who binge eat with hormonal BC/ coming off hormonal BC is mostly due to lifestyle change, but I personally never bought into it.  I’ve known too many girls who do/ have done hormonal BC (pills or IUD) and they’ve gained significant weight (significant enough to notice) and can only knock off some of it.
